story.title: From Freelancing to Global Technology Partner
story.content: Founded in 2019, Techrover began as a freelancing venture and has evolved into a comprehensive technology solutions provider. We've successfully delivered 500+ projects across 15+ countries, helping businesses transform through innovative technology solutions.

mission: To empower businesses worldwide with cutting-edge technology solutions that drive growth, efficiency, and innovation.
vision: To become the most trusted global technology partner, known for delivering exceptional AI-powered solutions and digital transformation services.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: We stay ahead of technology trends to deliver future-ready solutions.

values.title: Quality
values.description: Every project is delivered with meticulous attention to detail and excellence.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: Clear communication and honest partnerships with all our clients.

values.title: Global Mindset
values.description: Understanding diverse markets to deliver culturally relevant solutions.

team.name: Nitesh Verma
team.bio: Technology visionary with 6+ years of experience in leadership and business strategy.

team.name: Yogesh Sharma
team.bio: Creative designer with expertise in Figma, Adobe XD, and user experience design.

team.name: Yashshvi Singh
team.bio: Marketing specialist focused on SEO, social media marketing, and sales strategy.

team.name: Yashashvi Parihar
team.bio: AI specialist with expertise in machine learning, Python, and TensorFlow.

team.name: Naresh Kansara
team.bio: Full-stack developer specializing in Shopify, WordPress, and backend development.

team.name: Arjun Nagar
team.bio: Full-stack developer with expertise in React, Node.js, and modern web technologies.

team.name: Saksham Tolambia
team.bio: DevOps specialist ensuring scalable infrastructure with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes.

team.name: Dushyan Singh Nathawat
team.bio: Client relations expert managing international business development and communications.
